A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been a lifelong fan of Starwars so I was thoroughly looking forward to this episode-especially after enjoying the last two outings. I thought the opening scene was poorly handled-the humour wasn't welcome-it just undermined the Empire and felt like a Carry on Film...I just deleted a huge rant. There's too much wrong with this film and it certainly didn't serve the life long Star Wars fans well. Gutted. From the ratings\, I've also lost confidence in Rotten Tomatoes' critics.
